Docs.param: The getter delegate that provides the value. Note that the type of the getter is still checked inside this method.
Metadata of the input column. Note that metadata on a metadata column is somewhat rare except for certain types (for example, slot names for a vector, key values for something of key type).
Docs.summary: Add one metadata column, weakly-typed version.
